biography: Jonas, a familiar face from Vantaan Golfpuisto, is known for his strategic mind and calm demeanor on the course. Though he can be intense, Jonas is well-regarded amongst his peers.

With two past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Jonas has proven himself to be a serious contender. While he has yet to capture the coveted Hector Trophée or the Victor Trophy, his dedication to the sport is undeniable.

Currently considered retired from Hector events, Jonas will not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. Of course, a return to the course is always a possibility, as the world of golf is ever-changing.
